text: I don't remember!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Well... Maybe THIS will help JAR YOUR MEMORY-

text: Damn your black heart, Barbara Streisand!!

text: NOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!

role: Chef and Leonard Maltin are still driving.

text: I don't know, man... Maybe Barbara Streisand doesn't have a place up here after all.

text: Looks like we'll have to go to plan B.

text: Have you ever heard of the band called 'The Cure'?

text: AGH!!

text: Oh, fudge!!

text: Keep going this way, hurry!!

role: Chef turns a corner and speeds up.

title: Mecha Striesand

text: (Singing) Happiness with you is like happiness with...

text: AAGHAGHAG!!!!

text: OKAY! OKAY! I'LL TELL YOU WHERE THE TRIANGLE IS!!!

role: Milo dashes over and takes off Cartman's shoe. As soon as he
text: does, the boys all react to the smell.

text: Oh, for Christ's sake Cartman! When's the last time you changed your socks?!

text: And I suppose YOUR socks smell like the botanical gardens!

text: looks at it with awe.

role: Barbara storms over to the glass case and hits a button on
text: top.

text: NOW THE DIAMOND OF PANTHEOS IS COMPLETE!!!

text: Immediately, the pair LOCK together and begin to spin, the levitate of the ground in between the kids and Barbara Striesand.

title: Mecha Striesand

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Woa dude!!

text: starts to grow. She busts right out of the roof of her condo and keeps growing.

text: HUGE METALLIC MONSTER BARBARA STREISAND!

text: Jimbo's gun shop.

role: BOOM UP to reveal Mecha Streisand in a typical Godzilla pose.

text: avenue.

role: All is very peaceful and quiet.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: And so, just weeks after the devastating attack of Mutant Genetic creatures, zombies and Thanksgiving Turkeys, The town of South Park has managed to rebuild itself, once again becoming-

title: Mecha Striesand

text: Barbara makes her way down South Park avenue, destroying all the buildings as she goes.

text: Oh, goddammit not again...

role: Barbara easily destroys the buildings on South Park avenue.
text: People run screaming as a Japanese-style song takes over the audio.

text: Bar-Boo-RA!! Bar-Boo-RA!!! Ichiban kirai no hito!! BA-BOO-RA!! BA BOO- RA!!! Hana ga OOKII!!!!

title: Mecha Striesand

text: SIRENS and CRASHES in the distance.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: We'll get you, you bitch... And to think, I actually WATCHED your HBO special...

role: INT. BARBARA STREISAND'S 4 MILLION DOLLAR MOUNTAIN CONDO

text: (More than usual).

title: Mecha Striesand

text: KRAGHGHG!!!

text: the way, just in time.

text: KOO_RA KOO RA SUKI!!!

role: Chef looks to his right, where we actually see the Japanese

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Is that really necessary?

role: Now shit is REALLY going down.

role: Ultra-Maltin tries his eye lasers, but Mecha-Babs just puts

role: Mecha-Babs throws her arms up in victory.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: It's over... She's too strong for them children. We'll have to leave town.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Make it go away!! I hate Barbara Streisand! I hate her!!

text: My mom always said there are no monsters, but there are, aren't there, Chef...

text: We have to say goodbye to South Park...

text: Am I too late?

text: Who are you?

text: Dude! That's Robert Smith of The Cure!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: ROB-ATO SUMISU!! ROB-ATO SUMISU!!

text: Mothora Robert Smith!!!

role: Robert opens his huge mouth and lets out one of his high
text: pitched screams.

text: still standing shatter.

role: Mecha-Babs retaliates with her own high pitched note. Robert
text: covers his ears and even more windows break.

role: Stan has the little talkie around his wrist. Leonard Maltin,
text: back to normal size and looking severely beaten, walks up next to the boys.

text: We must tell him that her weak point is the nose...

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Robert Smith, hit her nose. Use Robot punch!

title: Mecha Striesand
role: The huge Robert Smith looks down at Stan and nods.

title: Mecha Striesand
role: Just then Mecha-Babs charges Smith!! But Smith hits a switch

role: It hits Babs square in the nose.

title: Mecha Striesand
role: Babs reels back with a horrific scream. The Diamond of
text: Pantheos flies out of her nose and lands right at Kyle's feet.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: The diamond of Pantheos!! She must be powerless now!!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: (Into walkie) Quickly, Robert Smith, she's powerless!!

title: Mecha Striesand
role: Robert runs up to the Dazed Mecha-Streisand and grabs her by
text: the mechanical tail.

title: Mecha Striesand
role: He spins her round and round and round...

title: Mecha Striesand
text: ROBAT-O SUMISU!! ROBAT-O SUMISU!!!

title: Mecha Striesand

text: Mecha-Streisand goes flying into outer space.

text: past the moon.

title: Mecha Striesand
role: She lets out a horrific cry. As her huge body gets past the

role: The explosion in the sky looks beautiful from South Park.
text: Like a huge firework.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: He DID IT!!!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: NO MORE BARBARA STREISAND EVER!!!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Wow, Robert Smith is the greatest person that ever lived!!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Our Savior!!

text: Can I have my walkie talkie back now, please?

text: Huh?

text: Hey, where is he going?

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Goodbye Robert Smith!!!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Thank you for your help. Visit us again.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: 'Disinigration' is the best album ever!!

role: Kyle has the two triangles of Zinthar.

text: Well, what should we do with the two triangles now?

role: In the back ground, Ike hops over to the trash and reaches

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Come on, Stan! it's MINE! I'll Roshambo you for it!

text: Go to hell, Cartman!

text: the trash.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Well, that whole experience sure did suck.

title: Mecha Striesand
text: Yeah, I'm sure glad that's over with!

title: Mecha Striesand
text: But you know, I've learned something today. I've learned that people who want power, a lot of power, always... end up dead.

text: Yeah.
